content: fitted cropped and colorful this crochet boho top is a summer favorite it was designed on a sunny beach in costa rica with palm trees overhead and feet in the sand you can feel the pura vida spirit with every stitch a perfect pair with high waisted shorts a flowy skirt or even as a bikini top it doesn t require much yarn of each color so it s great to use up yarn that is leftover from other projects featuring a crop top length with adjustable halter neck and back straps making it as functional as it is beautiful it s an easy to follow pattern making it a perfect project for crocheters of any level ☑ crochet pattern instant download pdf file for the pura vida halter ☑ skill level advanced beginner ☑ pattern includes list of materials yardage gauge abbreviation guide photo guidance helpful graphics sizing chart finished dimensions link to helpful video tutorial facebook community for support ☑ sizes included s 30 35 m 36 39 l 40 43 xl 44 47 2xl 48 51 & 3xl 52 55 *bust measurements ☑ language english american terminology ☑ materials needed medium #4 / dk weight yarn s-100 m-120 l-140 xl-160 2xl-180 3xl-200 yards of every color 3 75 mm hook tapestry needle scissors tape measure
